feed.title: Track Awesome Ipfs Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: Community list of awesome projects, apps, tools, pinning services and more related to IPFS.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Jan 08, 2025
entry.content:
Apps

  • IPFS Share (‚≠ê164) - Share files directly from the browser using IPFS.
  • Plebbit - Plebbit is a serverless, adminless, decentralised and infinitely scalable Social Media platform that is peer-to-peer and open-source.It's built on top of IPFS, Gossipsub and Blockchain namesystems (ENS, SNS).

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Dec 02, 2024
entry.content:
Apps

  • Planet (‚≠ê1.7k) - Build and host decentralized blogs and websites with IPFS on your Mac
  • TeaTime (‚≠ê523) - A fully static distributed library system powered by IPFS, SQLite and GitHub.

Apps

  • hyprspace (‚≠ê169) - A Lightweight VPN Built on top of IPFS + Libp2p for Truly Distributed Networks.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Jan 24, 2024
entry.content:
Pinning services

  • Gateway3 - A decentralized IPFS pinning service designed for developers. Supports content pinning, IPNS hosting, DAG operations, pinning tweets, and web hosting.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Jan 16, 2024
entry.content:
Services & Platforms

  • Apillon - a Web3 development platform, offering IPFS gateways, IPFS file-pinning via Crust network and IPFS powered hosting services for websites and apps.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Nov 13, 2023
entry.content:
Apps

  • Mintter (‚≠ê168) - Mintter¬†Hypermedia¬†is an¬†open system, built on¬†IPFS, that allows communities to collaborate on content that is structured and deeply linked. All content in the system is cryptographically signed, versioned, and made permanent with IPFS.
  • Quiet - Privacy focused, end-to-end encrypted chat app that runs a private IPFS network over Tor connections. Desktop and mobile iOS and Android apps available.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Oct 17, 2023
entry.content:
Tools

  • dump-ipfs (‚≠ê3) - A decentralized encrypted backup agent for popular databases supported by IPFS and Filecoin.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Oct 05, 2023
entry.content:
Browsers

  • Opera - Opera browser added support for ipfs:// in 2021

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Sep 28, 2023
entry.content:
Apps

  • Anytype - Anytype is a no-code, modular web builder designed to give ownership back to creators. It's built on our private, local-first, p2p-synced and open Anysync protocol.

Services & Platforms

  • Fileverse - Encrypted file sharing based on IPFS. Share any files with or without a wallet

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Sep 27, 2023
entry.content:
Apps

  • orbitchat.dev (‚≠ê27) - Ultra simple chatrooms on the web.

Tools

  • dScan (‚≠ê43) - A browser extension that uploads the content to Web3.Storage and generates QR codes for CIDs.

Services & Platforms

  • dAppling - Hosting platform with automated deployments from GitHub to IPFS

Pinning services

  • 4EVERLAND - 4EVERLAND is a pinning service that provides IPFS infrastructure and tooling making it easier and faster to host frontends, store data/NFT/file and fetch data with IPFS.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Sep 26, 2023
entry.content:
Tools

  • Pin Tweet to IPFS (‚≠ê31) - Web Extension which creates a WebArchiveZip of a tweet and adds to IPFS network.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Sep 22, 2023
entry.content:
Browsers

  • Agregore (‚≠ê840) - A minimal web browser for the distributed web. Supports downloading/uploading data from IPFS using the browser's fetch() API
  • Brave - A privacy-focused browser with many future forward features.
  • galacteek (‚≠ê168) - A multi-platform Qt5-based browser for the distributed web.

Apps

  • Durin - Mobile app for accessing and uploading content on the IPFS network.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Sep 21, 2023
entry.content:
Apps

  • IPFS-FPS (‚≠ê6) - A completely decentralized first person shooter. Built with Unity, Fleek, Unstoppable Domans and Pinata.
  • killcord (‚≠ê522) - A censorship resistant deadman's switch
  • Peer Web Site (‚≠ê187) - Peer to Peer Web Site hosting at your fingertips! Send full featured HTML (incl. CSS, JS) sites from your browser and attach files eg. videos, images, etc.
  • Peergos (‚≠ê2.2k) - End-to-end encrypted, peer-to-peer file storage and sharing.

Tools

  • git-remote-ipfs (‚≠ê232) - push/pull repositories from/to IPFS.
  • gomobile-ipfs (‚≠ê342) - IPFS and libp2p on Mobile, with Gomobile.
  • IPDR (‚≠ê547) - IPFS-backed Docker Registry.
  • IPFS Setup Action (‚≠ê21) - A GitHub Action to install and initialize go-ipfs to provision a cross-platform test environment on GitHub's CI platform.
  • ipfs-add-from-encrypted (‚≠ê53) - Encrypt a file or directory with AES256 then add to IPFS.
  • ipfs-mount (‚≠ê149) - Mount IPFS as a mapped drive on Windows.
  • ipfs-paste (‚≠ê32) - Paste stdin and clipboard to IPFS.
  • ipfsecret (‚≠ê26) - Encrypt and decrypt IPFS files with a secret passphrase.
  • IPLD Explorer (‚≠ê126) - Explore the Merkle Forest from the comfort of your browser.
  • Tellit - Encrypt files before uploading them using a keypair or a passphrase.
  • VIPFS (‚≠ê306) - Publish your Vue apps easily to IPFS.
  • youtube2ipfs (‚≠ê24) - Download videos from YouTube (and similar video platforms) and add them to IPFS.

Services & Platforms

  • Fleek - Open Web development platform for building, hosting, and storing sites and apps on IPFS, Filecoin, and the Internet Computer.
  • Fission - Fission builds open source protocols and managed solutions that empower developers to construct scalable and secure software applications.
  • Peergos - Your private, but social, space online. Store and edit documents and media. Share files or folders with friends.

Pinning services

  • Filebase - Pinning data to IPFS can be hard. Filebase removes that complexity.
  • NFT.Storage - Free decentralized storage and bandwidth for NFTs on IPFS & Filecoin.
  • Web3.storage - Simple file storage with IPFS & Filecoin.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Sep 14, 2023
entry.content:
Apps

  • archiveweb.page (‚≠ê1k) - A High-Fidelity Web Archiving Extension for Chrome and Chromium based browsers with support for IPFS.
  • brig (‚≠ê574) - File synchronization with git like interface and FUSE filesystem.
  • Diffuse (‚≠ê837) - Play music from your IPFS node, or any other cloud/distributed storage service you use.
  • IPFS Desktop (‚≠ê6.3k) - IPFS Desktop gives you all the power of IPFS in a convenient desktop app: a complete IPFS node, plus handy OS menubar/taskbar shortcuts and an all-in-one file manager, peer map, and content explorer.

Tools

  • git-ipfs-rehost (‚≠ê201) - A script to rehost your git repos in ipfs.
  • Git IPFS Remote Bridge (‚≠ê25) - set of programs written in Python 3 which allow Git user to clone, push, fetch, self-host or release Git repositories over IPFS decentralized data storage system.
  • ipfs-publish (‚≠ê67) - Continuous Delivery tool for delivery of static websites from Git providers to IPFS.
  • ipfs-video-gateway (‚≠ê46) - Cloud-init your own IPFS gateway on a cloud provider and easily pin content through a simple web interface.
  • SimpleAsWater Bot (‚≠ê13) - A twitter bot that adds, pins, unpins your tweets to public IPFS network using IPFS Cluster.

Services & Platforms

  • Ceramic - Ceramic combines IPFS content addressing with advanced cryptography and blockchain timestamps to guarantee security and verifiability of data.

Pinning services

  • Pinata - Build and manage your dapp through Pinata‚Äôs REST API and IPFS toolkit.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Oct 04, 2022
entry.content:
Tools

  • create-ipfs-app (‚≠ê17) - Set up a decentralized web3 app by running one command.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Sep 28, 2022
entry.content:
Tools

  • rivet (‚≠ê12) - A toolkit makes it easier to archive webpages to IPFS.
  • solid-ipfs - Using Solid to store IPFS Hash privately or publicly.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Aug 21, 2021
entry.content:
Apps

  • ipfs-chat (‚≠ê143) - Terminal-based, encrypted chatrooms. Allows private messaging & secure in-chat file/directory sharing. Server/broker-less (no signaling/rendezvous server needed). Works over LAN/internet(w/ NAT-traversal).

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Apr 06, 2021
entry.content:
Tools

  • ipns-pin (‚≠ê15) - A command-line tool to pin stuff via ipns.

  • ipfs-pinner (‚≠ê58) - A toolkit help upload files to IPFS pinning services.

Tools

  • Multiverse (‚≠ê84) - Multiverse is a decentralized version control system that enables peer-to-peer software development.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Sep 24, 2019
entry.content:
Tools

  • go-orbit-db (‚≠ê443) - This is a Golang port of OrbitDB that intends to be fully compatible with the original JavaScript version. OrbitDB is a serverless, distributed, peer-to-peer database.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Aug 28, 2019
entry.content:
Tools

  • orbit-db (‚≠ê8.6k) - OrbitDB is a serverless, distributed, peer-to-peer database that uses IPFS as its data storage and IPFS Pubsub to automatically sync databases with peers.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on May 20, 2019
entry.content:
Tools

  • ipfs-deploy (‚≠ê1.2k) - Zero-config CLI to deploy static websites: cd my-static-website && npx @agentofuser/ipfs-deploy

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Apr 30, 2019
entry.content:
Tools

  • mahuta (‚≠ê243) - Mahuta is a plug and play service for your micro-service architecture allowing to collect, store and index data on IPFS and offering search functionalities (full text, query).

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Nov 01, 2018
entry.content:
Apps

  • Autonomica "IPFS Social Proof" (‚≠ê148) - Autonomica is a Keybase-like Dapp for creating an identity and proving this identity via published social media and web proofs.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Aug 03, 2018
entry.content:
Tools

  • gatsby-plugin-ipfs (‚≠ê115) - Adds support for deploying Gatsby websites to IPFS by ensuring that assets are relative.

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Jul 31, 2018
entry.content:
Apps

  • Hardbin (‚≠ê254) - Hardbin is an encrypted pastebin, with the decryption key passed in the URL fragment
  • InterPlanetary Wayback (‚≠ê639) - Web Archive (WARC) indexing and replay using IPFS.
  • Interplanetary Wiki (‚≠ê101) - Wiki built on top of IPFS
  • IPFessay - A simple way to publish uncensorable essays on IPFS.
  • PushToTalk - Push to Talk lets you edit audio essays and publish them with IPFS.

Tools

  • http2ipfs (‚≠ê44) - This is a simple webtool to add URLs to an IPFS node.
  • ipfs-companion (‚≠ê2.1k) - Browser extension that simplifies access to IPFS resources.
  • ipfs-screencap (‚≠ê49) - Capture screenshots, publish them to IPFS, and copy the link to the clipboard.
  • ipget (‚≠ê408) - üõ∞Ô∏è wget for IPFS: retrieve files over IPFS and save them locally.
  • IPRedirect (‚≠ê8) - Browser userscript for redirecting IPFS/IPNS addresses to your local gateway. This should work on any browser that hasn't had an extension written for it yet and has support for userscripts.
